title: John Brooks (referee)
text:
John Edmund C. Brooks (born 1990) is an English <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Assistant%20referee%20%28association%20football%29">assistant referee</a> who is on the <a href="Select%20Group%20Referees">Select Group</a> panel of assistant referees for the <a href="Premier%20League">Premier League</a>. He is affiliated to the <a href="Leicestershire%20and%20Rutland%20County%20Football%20Association">Leicestershire and Rutland County Football Association</a> and often assists referee <a href="Mike%20Dean%20%28referee%29">Mike Dean</a>.
In May 2014 he officiated at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium">Wembley Stadium</a> in the <a href="2014%20Football%20League%20Championship%20play-off%20Final">Football League Championship play-off final</a> with <a href="Lee%20Mason%20%28referee%29">Lee Mason</a> as the referee.
In 2015 Brooks joined the <a href="FIFA%20International%20Referees%20List">FIFA International Referees List</a> as an assistant referee.
On 1 December 2021, Brooks took charge in his first Premier League fixture, a 0-0 draw between <a href="Wolverhampton%20Wanderers%20F.C.">Wolverhampton Wanderers</a> and <a href="Burnley%20F.C.">Burnley</a>.
